Series.Actors: |Bryan Cranston|Aaron Paul|Dean Norris|Giancarlo Esposito|Anna Gunn|Jonathan Banks|Bob Odenkirk|RJ Mitte|Betsy Brandt|Laura Fraser|Jesse Plemons|Christopher Cousins|Steven Michael Quezada|
Series.Overview: Walter White, a struggling high school chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with advanced lung cancer. He turns to a life of crime, producing and selling methamphetamine accompanied by a former student, Jesse Pinkman, with the aim of securing his family's financial future before he dies.
